00003 /**
00004  * @brief XML HTML form class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class is used to generate HTML forms from an XML file.

00008  * @class       Boo_Html_Form_Xml

00016 class Boo_Html_Form_Xml extends Boo_Html_Form {

00019      * @brief The validation method.
00020      * @see Boo_Html_Form::setValidationMethod() for possible methods.
00021      */
00022     protected $validationMethod = 'xml';
00023     
00024     /**
00025      * @brief Boo_Html_Ol object for validation errors.

00044     /**
00045      * @brief Default constructor.
00046      * @param string $id[optional] Form ID to open.
00047      * @return void.
00048      */
00049     public function __construct($id = false) {
00050         $this->errors = new Boo_Html_Ol;
00051         $this->io = new Boo_Io;
00052         
00053         if ($id !== false) {
00054             $this->open($id);
00055         }
00056         
00057         parent::__construct();
00058     }
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * @brief Sets the validation method.
00062      * 
00063      * Possible methods are:
00064      * \li xml
00065      * 
00066      * @param string $method The validation method.
00067      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00068      * @todo Add more validation methods.
00069      */
00070     public function setValidationMethod($method) {
00071         $method = strtolower(trim($method));
00072         
00073         switch ($method) {
00074             case 'xml':
00075                 $this->validationMethod = $method;
00076                 break;
00077             default:
00078                 trigger_error("Validation method {$method} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00079                 return false;
00080         }
00081         return true;
00082         
00083     }
00084     
00085     /**
00086      * @brief Gets the validation method.
00087      * @return string The validation method.
00088      */
00089     public function getValidationMethod() { return $this->validationMethod; }
00090     
00091     /**
00092      * @brief Open form with an ID.
00093      * 
00094      * This funciton provides API compatiblity. The same result can be achieved using Boo_Html_Form::loadXmlForm().
00095      * 
00096      * @param string $id The form ID.
00097      * @param string $filename The filename to open.
00098      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE on failure.
00099      */
00100     public function open($id, $filename = false) {
00101         $this->setAttr('id', $id);
00102         return $this->loadXmlForm($filename, true);
00103     }
00104     
00105     /**
00106      * @brief Sets the filename for the XML file.
00107      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00108      * @param string $filename The filename to set.
00109      */
00110     public function setFilename($filename) {
00111         $filename = trim($filename);
00112         if (file_exists($filename)) {
00113             if (is_readable($filename)) {
00114                 $this->filename = $filename;
00115                 return true;
00116             } else {
00117                 trigger_error("XML file {$filename} is not readable", E_USER_ERROR);
00118                 return false;
00119             }
00120         } else {
00121             trigger_error("XML file {$filename} does not exist", E_USER_ERROR);
00122             return false;
00123         }
00124         
00125         return true;
00126     }
00127     
00128     /**
00129      * @brief Returns the filename.
00130      * @return string The filename.
00131      */
00132     public function getFilename() { return $this->filename; }
00133     
00134     /**
00135      * @brief Loads form from XML file.
00136      * 
00137      * @param string $filename[optional] The XML filename.
00138      * @param bool $force[optional] Force load even if form is already loaded.
00139      * @return bool Returns TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.
00140      */
00141     public function loadXmlForm($filename = false, $force = false) {
00142         
00143         if ($this->xmlForm) {
00144             // form is already loaded
00145             if ($force === false) {
00146                 // not forced
00147                 return true;
00148             }
00149         }
00150         
00151         if ($filename === false) {
00152             if ($this->filename === false) {
00153                 // set default
00154                 $this->setFilename(BOO_XML_DIR . '/' . Boo_Helper::toFilenameCase($this->getAttr('id')) . '.xml');
00155             }
00156         } else {
00157             $this->setFilename($filename);
00158         }
00159         
00160         // check if xml file exists
00161         if (file_exists($this->filename)) {
00162             if (!is_readable($this->filename)) {
00163                 trigger_error("XML file {$this->filename} is not readable", E_USER_ERROR);
00164                 return false;
00165             }
00166             
00167             $xml = simplexml_load_file($this->filename);
00168             if ($xml === false) {
00169                 trigger_error("XML file {$this->filename} could not be loaded", E_USER_ERROR);
00170                 return false;
00171             }
00172         } else {
00173             trigger_error("XML file {$this->filename} does not exist", E_USER_ERROR);
00174             return false;
00175         }
00176         
00177         $count = 0;
00178         foreach ($xml->form as $form) {
00179             $xmlId = (string) $form['id'];
00180             
00181             $formId = $this->getAttr('id');
00182             
00183             if ($xmlId == $formId) {
00184                 $this->xmlForm = $form;
00185                 $count++;
00186                 // do not break so that count can be verified
00187             }
00188         }
00189         
00190         if ($count == 0) {
00191             trigger_error("XML form ID {$formId} could not be found in file {$this->filename}", E_USER_ERROR);
00192             return false;
00193         } elseif ($count == 1) {
00194             // perfect, now set attributes
00195             foreach ($this->xmlForm->attributes() as $key => $value) {
00196                 switch ($key) {
00197                     case 'id':
00198                         // do nothing, at this point id will already be set
00199                         break;
00200                     case 'tableName':
00201                         $this->io->setTableName($value);
00202                         break;
00203                     case 'primaryKey':
00204                         $this->io->setPrimaryKey($value);
00205                         break;
00206                         
00207                     default:
00208                         $this->setAttr($key, $value);
00209                         break;
00210                 }
00211             }
00212             return true;
00213             
00214         } else {
00215             // multiple forms found
00216             trigger_error("Multiple XML forms with ID {$formId} were found, this is not good", E_USER_ERROR);
00217             return false;
00218         }
00219     }

00222      * @brief Sets the errors object.
00223      * 
00224      * @param Boo_Html_Ol $errors The errors object.
00225      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00226      */
00227     public function setErrors(Boo_Html_Ol $errors) {
00228         if (!$errors->isValid()) {
00229             trigger_error('Errors object is not valid', E_USER_ERROR);
00230             return false;
00231         } else {
00232             // valid
00233             $this->errors = $errors;
00234             return true;
00235         }
00236     }

00239      * @brief Gets the errors.
00240      * 
00241      * @return Boo_Html_Ol Error list as an HTML object.

00243     public function getErrors() { return $this->errors; }

00246     /**
00247      * @brief Gets errors as simple array.
00248      * @return array Errors in an array.
00249      * @todo This could be more efficent and it removes lots of other usefull info like classes.
00250      */
00251     public function getErrorsArray() {
00252         $lis = $this->errors->getLis();
00253         $errors = array();
00254         foreach ($lis as $key => $value) {
00255             $errors[] = $value->getContent();
00256         }
00257         
00258         return $errors;
00259     }

00262     /**
00263      * @brief Validates a form.
00264      * 
00265      * @return bool Returns TRUE if valid, FALSE otherwise.
00266      */
00267     public function validate() {
00268         switch ($this->validationMethod) {
00269             case 'xml':
00270                 return $this->validateXml();
00271                 break;
00272             default:
00273                 trigger_error("Validation method {$this->validationMethod} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00274                 return false;
00275         }
00276     }
00277     
00278     /**
00279      * @brief Determins if the form is valid.
00280      * @return bool Returns TRUE if form is valid, FALSE otherwise.
00281      */
00282     public function isValid() { return $this->validate(); }
00283     
00284     /**
00285      * @brief Preloads values into \c $_POST.
00286      * 
00287      * @param Boo_IO $io The Boo_Io object to use data.
00288      * @param bool $override[optional] Override existing values.
00289      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00290      */
00291     public function preloadPost(Boo_IO $io, $override = true) {
00292         switch ($this->validationMethod) {
00293             case 'xml':
00294                 return $this->preloadPostXml($io, $override);
00295                 break;
00296             default:
00297                 trigger_error("Validation method {$this->validationMethod} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00298                 return false;
00299         }
00300     }
00301     
00302     /**
00303      * @brief Preloads values from XML file into \c $_POST.
00304      * 
00305      * @param Boo_IO $io The Boo_IO object to use data.
00306      * @param bool $override Override existing values.
00307      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00308      */
00309     protected function preloadPostXml(Boo_IO $io, $override) {
00310         $this->loadXmlForm();
00311         
00312         foreach ($this->xmlForm->children() as $child) {
00313             $this->handlePreloadPostXml($child, $io, $override);
00314             
00315         }
00316         
00317         return true;
00318     }
00319     
00320     /**
00321      * @brief Handles preloading values from XML file into \a $_POST.
00322      * 
00323      * This function is recursive.
00324      * 
00325      * @param SimpleXMLElement $child The current child element.
00326      * @param Boo_IO $io The Boo_IO object to use data.
00327      * @param bool $override Override existing values.
00328      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00329      */
00330     protected function handlePreloadPostXml(SimpleXMLElement $child, Boo_IO $io, $override) {
00331         $controlType = $child->getName(); // text, checkbox, etc...
00332         
00333         if ($this->isFormControl($controlType)) {
00334             $name = (string) $child['name'];
00335             $field = (string) $child['io'];
00336             if ($field) {
00337                 
00338                 if ($override) {
00339                     $_POST[$name] = $io->get($field);
00340                 } else {
00341                     if (array_key_exists($name, $_POST)) {
00342                         // value already exists, skip
00343                     } else {
00344                         $_POST[$name] = $io->get($field);
00345                     }
00346                 }
00347             }
00348             
00349             return true;
00350         }
00351         
00352         foreach ($child->children() as $recursiveChild) {
00353             $this->handlePreloadPostXML($recursiveChild, $io, $override);
00354         }
00355         
00356         return true;
00357     }
00358     
00359     /**
00360      * @brief Validates a form using the XML validation method.
00361      * 
00362      * @param string $id[optional] Form ID.
00363      * @return bool Returns TRUE if valid, FALSE otherwise.
00364      */
00365     protected function validateXml() {
00366         $this->loadXmlForm();
00367         
00368         $totalValid = true;
00369         foreach ($this->xmlForm->children() as $child) {
00370             $this->handleValidateXml($child, $totalValid);
00371         }
00372         
00373         return $totalValid;
00374     }
00375     
00376     /**
00377      * 
00378      * Used recursivly by Boo_Html_Form_Xml::validateXml().
00379      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE on error.
00380      * @param SimpleXMLElement $child Simple XML child element.
00381      * @param bool $totalValid Keeps track of the validity of the entire form.
00382      */
00383     protected function handleValidateXml(SimpleXMLElement $child, &$totalValid) {
00384         $controlType = $child->getName(); // text, checkbox, etc...
00385             
00386         if ($this->isFormControl($controlType)) {
00387             $name = (string) $child['name'];
00388             foreach ($child->error as $childError) {
00389                 $validation =  (string) $childError['validation'];
00390                 
00391                 switch ($controlType) {
00392                     case 'file':
00393                     // sepcial case, this will probebly only work with Boo_Validator::isUploaded()
00394                     $value = $name;
00395                     break;
00396                     
00397                     case 'select':
00398                         $value = _post($name);
00399                         //echo "MOO";
00400                         
00401                         
00402                         // ***************************************************************************
00403                         // select validation code here
00404                         
00405                     default:
00406                     // normal control
00407                     $value = _post($name);
00408                 }
00409                 
00410                 $required = (string) $childError['required'];
00411                 
00412                 if ($required) {
00413                     $required = word_bool($required);
00414                 } else {
00415                     $required = false;
00416                 }
00417                 
00418                 $bv = new Boo_Validator;
00419                 $valid = $bv->validate($value, $validation, $required);
00420                 
00421                 if ($valid) {
00422                     // valid do nothing
00423                     
00424                 } else {
00425                     // not valid, add error
00426                     $li = new Boo_Html_Li;
00427                     $li->setContent((string) $childError);
00428                     $this->errors->addLi($li);
00429                 }
00430                 
00431                 // track valid though the loop
00432                 $totalValid = $totalValid && $valid;
00433             }
00434             
00435             return $totalValid;
00436         }
00437         
00438         
00439         foreach ($child->children() as $recursiveChild) {
00440             $this->handleValidateXml($recursiveChild, $totalValid);
00441         }
00442         
00443         return true;
00444     }
00445     
00446     /**
00447      * @brief Returns a list of attributes added to the element
00448      *
00449      * @param SimpleXMLElement $child The child.
00450      * @return array The array of attributes, attributes used by the system are not returned.
00451      */
00452     private function getFormContorlChildAttrs(SimpleXMLElement $child) {
00453         $results = array();
00454         foreach ($child->attributes() as $key=>$value) {
00455             
00456             switch ((string) $key) {
00457                 // safe list, these values are used by the system so do not add them as attributes
00458                 case 'class':
00459                 case 'io':
00460                 case 'format':
00461                     // do nothing;
00462                     break;
00463                 default:
00464                     // value is not on the safe list so add it
00465                     $results[(string) $key] = (string) $value;
00466             }
00467         }
00468         return $results;
00469     }

00473     /**
00474      * @brief Determins if a child is a form control.
00475      * 
00476      * @param string $childName The child name
00477      * @return bool Returns TRUE if child is a form control, FALSE otherwise.
00478      */
00479     protected function isFormControl($childName) {
00480         switch ($childName) {
00481             case 'button':
00482             case 'checkbox':
00483             case 'file':
00484             case 'hidden':
00485             case 'image':
00486             case 'password':
00487             case 'radio':
00488             case 'reset':
00489             case 'submit':
00490             case 'text':
00491             case 'select':
00492             case 'textarea':
00493                 return true;
00494                 break;
00495             default:
00496                 return false;
00497         }
00498     }
00499     
00500     /**
00501      * @brief Determins if a child is a HTML form control.
00502      * 
00503      * @param string $childName The child name
00504      * @return bool Returns TRUE if child is a HTML form control, FALSE otherwise.
00505      */
00506     protected function isFormControlHtml($childName) {
00507         return $childName == 'html';
00508     }
00509     
00510     /**
00511      * @brief Determins if a child is a PHP form control.
00512      * 
00513      * @param string $childName The child name
00514      * @return bool Returns TRUE if child is a PHP form control, FALSE otherwise.
00515      */
00516     protected function isFormControlPhp($childName) {
00517         return $childName == 'php';
00518     }
00519     
00520     /**
00521      * @brief Makes the IO object so you can use it.
00522      * 
00523      * Must be called before saving the IO object.
00524      * 
00525      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00526      */
00527     public function makeIo() {
00528         $this->loadXmlForm();
00529         
00530         foreach ($this->xmlForm->children() as $child) {
00531             $this->handleMakeIo($child);
00532         }
00533         
00534         return true;
00535     }
00536     
00537     /**
00538      * @brief Gets the Boo_Io object;
00539      * 
00540      * Added for API compatibility. Boo_Html_Form_Xml::$io is public so this is 
00541      * technically not needed.
00542      * 
00543      * @return Boo_Io Returns the Boo_Io object.
00544      */
00545     public function getIo() {
00546         if ($this->io->isEmpty()) {
00547             // empty so make it
00548             $this->makeIo();
00549         }
00550         return $this->io;
00551     }
00552     
00553     /**
00554      * @brief Handles making the IO object.
00555      * 
00556      * Used recursivly by Boo_Html_Form_Xml::makeIo().
00557      * 
00558      * @return bool Returns TRUE if form is valid, FALSE otherwise.
00559      * @param SimpleXMLElement $child The Simple XML child element.
00560      */
00561     protected function handleMakeIo(SimpleXMLElement $child) {
00562         
00563         if (!$this->isValid()) {
00564             trigger_error('Form is not valid, can not continue', E_USER_ERROR);
00565             return false;
00566         }
00567         
00568         $controlType = $child->getName(); // text, checkbox, etc...
00569         
00570         if ($this->isFormControl($controlType)) {
00571         
00572             $io = (string) $child['io'];
00573             $value = (string) $child['value'];
00574             $format = (string) $child['format'];
00575             if ($io) {
00576                 // check name
00577                 $name = (string) $child['name'];
00578                 if (!$name) {
00579                     trigger_error("XML form control type {$controlType} is missing the required name attribute", E_USER_ERROR);
00580                     return false;
00581                 }
00582                 
00583                 if (array_key_exists($name, $_POST)) {
00584                     $setValue = $_POST[$name];
00585                     
00586                     if ($format) {
00587                         $setValue = Boo_Format::format($setValue, $format);
00588                     }
00589                     
00590                     $this->io->set($io, $setValue);
00591                 } else {
00592                     // this helps with checkboxes
00593                     if (BOO_DEBUG) { trigger_error("Failed to find key {$name} in \$_POST, setting to FALSE", E_USER_NOTICE); }
00594                     $this->io->set($io, false);
00595                     
00596                 }
00597                 
00598             }
00599             
00600             return true;
00601         }
00602         
00603         foreach ($child->children() as $recursiveChild) {
00604             $this->handleMakeIo($recursiveChild);
00605         }
00606         
00607         return true;
00608     }
00609     
00610     /**
00611      * @brief Adds from contorls to existing Boo_Html item.
00612      * 
00613      * @param SimpleXMLElement $child The XML child element.
00614      * @return string Returns HTML on success, FALSE otherwise.
00615      */
00616     private function handleFormControlChild(SimpleXMLElement $child) {
00617             $tmpHtml = false;
00618             $controlType = $child->getName(); // text, checkbox, etc...
00619             
00620             // check id
00621             $id = (string) $child['id'];
00622             if (!$id) {
00623                 trigger_error("XML form control {$controlType} is missing the required id attribute", E_USER_ERROR);
00624                 return false;
00625             }
00626             
00627             // check name
00628             $name= (string) $child['name'];
00629             if (!$name) {
00630                 trigger_error("XML from control {$controlType} is missing the required name attribute", E_USER_ERROR);
00631                 return false;
00632             }
00633             
00634             // label
00635             if ($child->label) {
00636                 $label = new Boo_Html_Label;
00637                 $label->setAttr('for', $id);
00638                 $label->setContent((string) $child->label);
00639             } else {
00640                 $label = new Boo_Html_Empty;
00641             }
00642             
00643             switch ($controlType) {
00644                 case 'button':
00645                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Button;
00646                     
00647                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00648                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00649                     
00650                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00651                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00652                     break;
00653                     
00654                 case 'checkbox':
00655                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Checkbox;
00656                     
00657                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00658                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00659                     
00660                     // wrap label around input
00661                     $tmpHtml .= $label->htmlOpen();
00662                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html() . $label->htmlInner() . $label->htmlClose();
00663                     break;
00664                     
00665                 case 'file':
00666                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_File;
00667                     
00668                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00669                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00670                     
00671                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00672                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00673                     break;
00674                     
00675                 case 'hidden':
00676                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Hidden;
00677                     
00678                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00679                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00680                     
00681                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00682                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00683                     break;
00684                     
00685                 case 'image':
00686                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Image;
00687                     
00688                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00689                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00690                     
00691                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00692                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00693                     break;
00694                     
00695                 case 'password':
00696                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Password;
00697                     
00698                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00699                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00700                     
00701                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00702                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00703                     break;
00704                     
00705                 case 'radio':
00706                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Radio;
00707                     
00708                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00709                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00710                     
00711                     // wrap label around input
00712                     $tmpHtml .= $label->htmlOpen();
00713                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html() . $label->htmlInner() . $label->htmlClose();
00714                     break;
00715                     
00716                 case 'reset':
00717                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Reset;
00718                     
00719                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00720                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00721                     
00722                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00723                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00724                     
00725                     break;
00726                     
00727                 case 'submit':
00728                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Submit;
00729                     
00730                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00731                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00732                     
00733                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00734                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00735                     break;
00736                     
00737                 case 'text':
00738                     $input = new Boo_Html_Input_Text;
00739                     
00740                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00741                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00742                     
00743                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00744                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00745                     break;
00746                     
00747                 case 'select':
00748                     $input = new Boo_Html_Select;
00749                     
00750                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00751                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00752                     
00753                     $data = array();
00754                     
00755                     foreach ($child->data->children() as $option) {
00756                         $key = (string) $option['value'];
00757                         $value = (string) $option;
00758                         
00759                         $selected = (string) $option['selected'];
00760                         if ($selected) {
00761                             $input->addDefault($key);
00762                         }
00763                         
00764                         $data[$key] = $value;
00765                     }
00766                     
00767                     $dataSource = trim ((string) $child->data['source']);
00768                     
00769                     if ($dataSource) {
00770                         // add ending semicolon if needed
00771                         if (substr($dataSource, -1) != ';') {
00772                             $dataSource .= ';';
00773                         }
00774                         
00775                         $result = eval("return {$dataSource}");
00776                         
00777                         // $data = array_merge($result, $data); !!! this will not work
00778                         // turns associative arrays with numeric keys into numerically indexed array
00779                         
00780                         /** @todo Write a better array merge function. */
00781                         $data = $result + $data;
00782                     }
00783                     
00784                     $input->setData($data);
00785                     
00786                     $title = (string) $child->data['title'];
00787                     if (!Boo_Validator::isNull($title)) { $input->setTitle($title); }
00788                     
00789                     $default = (string) $child->data['default'];
00790                     if (!Boo_Validator::isNull($default)) { $input->setDefault($default); }
00791                     
00792                     $selected = (string) $child->data['selected'];
00793                     if (!Boo_Validator::isNull($selected)) { $input->setSelected($selected); }
00794                     
00795                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00796                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00797                     break;
00798                     
00799                 case 'textarea':
00800                     $input = new Boo_Html_Textarea;
00801                     
00802                     $input->setClass((string) $child['class']);
00803                     $input->addAttrs($this->getFormContorlChildAttrs($child));
00804                     
00805                     $tmpHtml .= $label->html();
00806                     $tmpHtml .= $input->html();
00807                     
00808                     break;
00809                     
00810                 default:
00811                     trigger_error("XML form control {$controlType} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00812                     return false;
00813             }
00814             
00815             return $tmpHtml;
00816     }
00817     
00818     /**
00819      * @brief Handles a form child.
00820      * 
00821      * @param SimpleXMLElement $child The form child.
00822      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise. Function is recursive.
00823      */
00824     protected function handleFormChild(SimpleXMLElement $child) {
00825         $name = $child->getName();
00826         // form control
00827         if ($this->isFormControl($name)) {
00828             $this->appendContent($this->handleFormControlChild($child));
00829             return true;
00830         }
00831         
00832         // special html control, no attributes
00833         if ($this->isFormControlHtml($name)) {
00834             $attributes = $child->attributes();
00835             if (!empty($attributes)) {
00836                 trigger_error("Form child {$name} can not have attributes", E_USER_WARNING);
00837                 return false;
00838             }
00839             
00840             $this->appendContent((string) $child);
00841             return true;
00842         }
00843         
00844         // special php control, no attributes
00845         if ($this->isFormControlPhp($name)) {
00846             $attributes = $child->attributes();
00847             if (!empty($attributes)) {
00848                 trigger_error("Form child {$name} can not have attributes", E_USER_WARNING);
00849                 return false;
00850             }
00851             
00852             $this->appendContent(eval((string) $child));
00853             return true;
00854         }
00855         
00856         // normal html control
00857         $tmp = new Boo_Html($name);
00858         
00859         // set attributes
00860         $attrs = array();
00861         foreach ($child->attributes() as $key=>$value) {
00862             $attrs[(string) $key] = (string) $value;
00863             
00864         }
00865         if (!empty($attrs)) {
00866             $tmp->addAttrs($attrs);
00867         }
00868         
00869         $this->appendContent($tmp->htmlOpen());
00870         
00871         // add content if it exists
00872         $this->appendContent(trim((string) $child)); // trim removes extra whitespace from xml file
00873         
00874         foreach ($child->children() as $recursiveChild) {
00875             $this->handleFormChild($recursiveChild);
00876         }
00877         
00878         $this->appendContent($tmp->htmlClose());
00879         return true;
00880     }
00881     
00882     /**
00883      * @brief Determins if form is posted.
00884      */
00885     public function isPostback() {
00886         if (isset($_POST['_form'])) {
00887             return $_POST['_form'] == $this->getAttr('id');
00888         } else {
00889             return false;
00890         }
00891     }
00892     
00893     /**
00894      * @brief Unsets the \c $_POST array.
00895      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00896      */
00897     public function clearPost() {
00898         $_POST = array();
00899         return true;
00900     }
00901     
00902     /**
00903      * @brief Returns the HTML for the form.
00904      * 
00905      * @param array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes.
00906      * @return string The HTML for the form, FALSE on error.
00907      */
00908     public function html(array $attrs = array()) {
00909         
00910         $this->loadXmlForm();
00911         
00912         $formName = new Boo_Html_Input_Hidden;
00913         $formName->setAttr('name', '_form');
00914         $formName->setAttr('value', $this->getAttr('id'));
00915         
00916         $fieldset = new Boo_Html_Fieldset;
00917         $fieldset->addClass('system');
00918         $fieldset->appendContent($formName);
00919         
00920         foreach ($this->xmlForm->children() as $child) {
00921             $this->handleFormChild($child);
00922         }
00923         $this->appendContent($fieldset);
00924         return parent::html($attrs);
00925     }
00926 }
